Title: Contorno
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Tom de Ville, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Jack and Will along with Chiyoh arrive in Florence with different agendas for Hannibal while Detective Pazzi gets close.
